Button-up front."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"color-options",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Color:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"colors",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`color-swatch green ${selectedColor==='green'?'selected':''}`,onClick:()=>setSelectedColor('green')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`color-swatch blue ${selectedColor==='blue'?'selected':''}`,onClick:()=>setSelectedColor('blue')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`color-swatch grey ${selectedColor==='grey'?'selected':''}`,onClick:()=>setSelectedColor('grey')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`color-swatch black ${selectedColor==='black'?'selected':''}`,onClick:()=>setSelectedColor('black')})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"size-options",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Size:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sizes",children:['XS','S','M','L','XL'].map(size=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:`size ${selectedSize===size?'selected':''}`,onClick:()=>setSelectedSize(size),children:size},size))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"add-to-cart",onClick:handleAddToFavorites,children:"ADD TO FAVORITES"})]})]})]});};export default ProductDetail;
